'''Two-Eyed Pim''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The captain flourishes a sweeping bow. When he bends forward, a golden suolenet slips from his collar to dangle on the end of its chain.

He tucks it away as he straightens, but not before you notice the etching on its front side - it marks him as the third chair on the Consuaglo mes Casitàs.}}

Two-Eyed Pim served under [Furrante](/captainFurrante/) decades ago, as his first mate, before he built his own fleet of Príncipi ships. 

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Honor Among Thieves](/honorAmongThieves/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* If the Príncipi are the greatest rival at the end of the game and Pim is their leader, he will confront the Watcher at Ukaizo.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Honor Among Thieves](/honorAmongThieves/): Although loyal to Furrante, Pim won't be supportive of the treatment [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/) receives. If Furrante and Aeldys don't make it out alive, Pim becomes leader of the Príncipi.

## Trivia

* If Two-Eyed Pim is killed by the Watcher, he'll survive the attack and become [One-Eyed Pim](/oneEyedPim/).
[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)

'''Two-Eyed Pim''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|The captain flourishes a sweeping bow. When he bends forward, a golden suolenet slips from his collar to dangle on the end of its chain.

He tucks it away as he straightens, but not before you notice the etching on its front side - it marks him as the third chair on the Consuaglo mes Casitàs.}}

Two-Eyed Pim served under [[Captain Furrante|Furrante]] decades ago, as his first mate, before he built his own fleet of Príncipi ships. 

==Interactions==
{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [[Honor Among Thieves]]
|none            = 
|other           =
* If the Príncipi are the greatest rival at the end of the game and Pim is their leader, he will confront the Watcher at Ukaizo.
}}
===Quests===
* [[Honor Among Thieves]]: Although loyal to Furrante, Pim won't be supportive of the treatment [[Captain Aeldys]] receives. If Furrante and Aeldys don't make it out alive, Pim becomes leader of the Príncipi.

==Trivia==
* If Two-Eyed Pim is killed by the Watcher, he'll survive the attack and become [[One-Eyed Pim]].
